title: Nebraska Congressman Convicted in Campaign Finance Case - The New York Times
content:
1. Nebraska Congressman Convicted in Campaign Finance Case  The New York Times

description: Representative Jeff Fortenberry was accused of lying to F.B.I. agents investigating illegal foreign donations.
